lead_paragraph: Arron Afflalo and Carmelo Anthony both scored 23 points, and New York almost lost a 16-point lead before holding on to beat Atlanta 107-101 Tuesday night, giving the Knicks their second win over the Hawks in three days.

headline.print_headline: Afflalo, Anthony Lead Knicks Past Hawks 107-101
headline.main: Afflalo, Anthony Lead Knicks Past Hawks 107-101

snippet: Arron Afflalo and Carmelo Anthony both scored 23 points, and New York almost lost a 16-point lead before holding on to beat Atlanta 107-101 Tuesday night, giving the Knicks their second win over the Hawks in three days....
